reviews.text: Not impressed at all. One worker, I think his name is Damien, was horrible to my children and has been on numerous occasions including: mocking them, not letting them use the lift when one was in pain and clearly limping, he locked the lift and leading to an elderly woman not be able to use this facility there my children had to assist her with two sets of stairs. The lift was locked many times when it was completely fine. What if my children weren’t there for that elderly woman? I’m really not happy with this behaviour and think something should be done about it
It's annoying in the early morning, and mid afternoon's as the lifts keep being turned off?? Why, this the busiest times, this is a constant issue..
Great little station since they refurbished. Shame you can’t collect prepaid rail tickets here, meaning you have to pay £6 for delivery.

Please get a ticket machine so we can pick up tickets bought in advance. At the minute I have to arrive at least 15 minutes prior to pick up ticket from the desk as there are lots of people asking very detailed questions about trains, tickets, toilets, rail passes etc which hold up the queue.
